original: Johansson, Carl Axel, kommunalborgmästare, Kungälv, f. 12/8/15 i Falkenberg av slöjdlär. Bernhard J. o. Signe Johansson. G. 44 m. Iris Larsson. Barn: Christel f. 45. — Re-alex. 34, Filip Holmqvists hand rinst. 35, DSI 40. Anst. å I. Skogbs Adv:-byrå i Falkenberg 35-36, i A-B Gbgs Hand :bank där 36-37, h. drätselkamm. där 37-38, h. drätselkamm. i Borås 38-39, ’stadskamr. i Kun.gälv 40-45, kom-miborgmäst. där sed. 45. Led. av Kungälvs tax:nd 42-44, Kungälvs idr;-platskomm. sed. 42 o. direkt, f. Kungälvs m. fl. kommuners fattigv :förb. sed. 41, ordf. i Kungälvs stads bo-stadslånend ’sed. 43 o. i Kungälvs fam:bidr:nd sed. 41, förste ställf. civ:-försvxhef inom Kungälvs civ.försv:-omr. sed. 45, ordf. i Kungälvs roddkL sed. 46, led. av styr. f. Gbgs o. Boh. L. Bostadskreditfören. i Gbg sed. 45, överförmjmd. f. Kungälvs stad sed. 46. Hobbies: rodd, skytte o. frimärken.
translated: Johansson, Carl Axel, municipal chief executive, Kungälv, b. 12/8/15 in Falkenberg to crafts teacher Bernhard J. and Signe Johansson. Married in 1944 to Iris Larsson. Children: Christel b. 1945. - Graduated from Realex in 1934, worked for Filip Holmqvist's metalwork company in 1935, and joined the law firm I. Skogb Advokatbyrå in Falkenberg in 1935-36. Worked at A-B Gbg's Hand: bank in 1936-37 and at the Treasury Department in Gothenburg in 1937-38. Worked at the Treasury Department in Borås in 1938-39 and became city treasurer in Kungälv from 1940-45. Became municipal chief executive there in 1945. Was a member of Kungälv's tax board in 1942-44, the Kungälv sports committee since 1942, and the director of the Kungälv and other municipalities' welfare association since 1941. Was the chairman of Kungälv's housing loan committee since 1943 and the first deputy chief of civilian defense in Kungälv since 1945. Was the chairman of Kungälv's rowing club since 1946 and a member of the board of the Gothenburg and Bohus County Housing Credit Society since 1945. Became the transfer manager for Kungälv city in 1946. Hobbies: rowing, shooting and stamps.
